    public static class Optimizer.OptimizerSWFTarget

    A SWF target that will start with a SWF, and simply link it to build it

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public ISWF build(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Description copied from interface: ISWFTarget
        Adds frames and tags to those frames for all the content generated by the target. When this method returns false, the ISWF should be considered invalid and the specified problemCollection should be searched for the cause.
        Specified by:
        build in interface ISWFTarget
        Overrides:
        build in class SWFTarget
        Parameters:
        problems - Collection to which all problems of all CompilationUnits whose output is added to the specified ISWF are added.
        Returns:
        ISWF if all tags generated by the target we added to the specified SWF.
